DOC.brief_summary: self-expandable metal stent palliation malignant biliary stricture
DOC.brief_title: Covered Self-expandable Metal Stents Palliation Malignant Biliary Strictures : Evaluation New Type Stent
DOC.detailed_description: The ComVi biliary stent ( Taewoong Medical Inc. , Seoul , Korea ) , cover metallic stent expand polytetrafluoroethylene ( e-PTFE ) membrane sandwich two wire layer weaker axial force stent . Patients middle-distal malignant biliary stricture symptom jaundice , itch pain .
DOC.criteria: Patients malignant stenosis middle low third common bile duct inoperable and/or unresectable . Patients without liver metastasis 6 month life expectancy Patients first attempt endoscopic biliary drainage . Negative history biliary tract surgery . Patients ampullary cancer . Patients hilar and/or intrahepatic duct malignancy . Patients haemobilia . Patients acute cholangitis time stenting . Patients previous percutaneous , endoscopic surgical biliary drainage .
